label: TechnicalCharacteristic
comment: A prominent technical attribute or aspect.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the certification granted to this technical characteristic.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value of the construction of this technical characteristic.
A code specifying a measurement method for this product characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: A technical characteristic applicable to this product colour.
A technical characteristic related to this supply chain event.
